item.title: Don't overwater succulent plants
item.description: ##12:29 Saturday 08 November 2014 JST## Their leaves rot when they are chilling in water. Somone overwatered the aloe (?) Lin got from Mikako and its leaves started to go black and fall off. ahem. I dunno if it’s revivable, but I put one of the still green leaves on some course sand cactus soil and put the rootball in a separate container with course sand cactus soil. Next to the rootball, I put little still-green tips of leaves that had otherwise turned black and mushy inside.
